summary: A set of experimental command‑line utilities for K2‑based automatic speech recognition, covering large‑scale speech‑to‑text alignment, token‑level language model construction, and training/fine‑tuning of BPE or word‑piece tokenized models (including RNNT) with distributed GPU support.
business_intent: Accelerate research and development of graph‑based ASR systems by providing ready‑to‑use tools for data alignment, language model creation, and scalable model training, thereby reducing engineering effort and enabling rapid experimentation on large speech corpora.
